name: Sharpedo
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as “The Bully of the Sea.”

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hard Bite
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.
